client.controller
Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
  client.controller.ClientController

public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object

this is a singleton class that provides an API for the card deck platform

Author:
Yoav

cardMoved

public void cardMoved(Card card,
                      int from,
                      int to,
                      int byWhomId)
notify to gui that card was moved from droppable A to droppable B(usually called when incoming card move message)

Parameters:
card - the card that was moved
from - droppable's id of card's original place
to - droppable's id of card's new place
byWhomId - the user-name that did the action

Parameters:
cardId - dragged card'd id
fromId - id of the droppable the card is dragged from
username - who made that action

requestCard

public void requestCard(java.lang.Integer fromId,
                        int amount)
request a card from deck, call this method when logic wants to take card from deck/player and not action that is done by the user. important for sync the deck's/player's cards by the server

Parameters:
fromId - id of the droppable you want to take/request a card from
amount - number of cards you want to take/request from given droppable zone's id

getMe

public Player getMe()
get my player instance

Returns:
instance of the player that holds the device, NULL if no game(rare)

dealCards

                      int to)
deal given card to given droppable zone id

Parameters:
cards - the cards to deal
to - droppable zone id , where that cards should be delt to

positionUpdate2

public void positionUpdate2(java.util.ArrayList<Pair<Position.Player,Position.Player>> movingList)
called when live position is on, swapping given players position

Parameters:
movingList - array list of pairs that contains the old position and the new position of a player needed to swap

draggableMotion

public void draggableMotion(java.lang.String username,
                            int cardId,
                            float x,
                            float y)
notify gui about card that is being dragged (called at incoming message: draggable-motion)

Parameters:
username - player that is dragging the card
cardId - id of the card that is being dragged
x - the x-position of the card
y - the y-position of the card
